name: Photography Club
description: A photography afterschool club will give students the opportunity to let their creativity show while also learning some photography techniques.

name: Public Speaking Club
description: This club will help students learn how to speak in public and convey the message they want to get across. Students will learn confidence.

name: Cooking Club
description: You can tailor the lessons and recipe skill levels based on the ages of the students in your club.If you have access to an oven, that would be great.

name: STEM Club
description: A STEM club is the ideal way to get students interested in science, technology, engineering, and math. You can plan out a variety of different experiments.

name: Singing Club
description: Do the students in your club love to sing? If so, a singing club may be a very popular club to run. You could teach more classic songs.

name: Board Games Club
description: Board games offer students the chance to have fun, while also learning how to be strategic. So giving them time to play during an afterschool club could be a welcome opportunity.

name: Gardening Club
description: A gardening club can be a lot of fun for students while also helping them learn important skills. Beyond the obvious skills of how to care for plants and grow their own foods,

name: Sports Club
description: Choose your favorite sport to play with students to offer students the opportunity to play multiple sports over the course of the clubâ€”it's up to you!

name: Dance Club
description: Get students up off their feet and moving with a dance club. There are a lot of options with this type of club:
